yeet - Chicago / Remote (USA) - Rust, Python, Typescript

Building a first of its kind dynamic runtime on top of Linux's BPF subsystem.

  • Low Latency / Real-time networking
  • Websockets
  • Terraform / AWS

  • Real-time data visualization
